genresAdvancedInfo.name: russian heavy metal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Russian heavy metal is a genre of heavy metal music that emerged in Russia in the 1980s. It is characterized by its use of powerful, distorted guitar riffs, thunderous drums, and soaring vocals. The lyrics often deal with themes of war, history, and mythology, and the scene has a strong sense of community and camaraderie.
